Name: Judith's Group
description:
Pictured above is Judith, who, as a group leader, is representing her group formed by 11 farmers in Mumias District, Kenya. She is a mother to 5 children and is known by her community as a very friendly person.

Initially, Judith joined One Acre Fund in 2013 because she wanted to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds. Since she joined the program she says that her life has improved, especially because she has been able to consistently feed her family. With the profits from the coming harvesting season, Judith plans to send her children to school.

Between the 11 farmers in Judith's Group, a total of 7.75 acres of land will be planted using the maize seeds and fertilizer received with the loan. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 2 solar lights.
